name: Terminal Hacker (itch)
description:
Terminal hacker is a simple game designed to be played when you dont have a lot of time and are just waiting for something, or if you want to play for hours trying to beat your high score.

Features: 3 different game modes with 4 different difficulties. different vocabularies, simple English and expanded English. Simple uses the most common English words, expanded uses almost all English words.

How to play: type a letter into your keyboard, if you guess one of the letters correctly it will reveal that letter or the whole word. pressing Escape while in game will bring you back to the main menu, pushing escape while on the main menu will close the game.

also on steam greenlight http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=629708682

NOTE: as it currently stands there is a bug with changing difficulties and vocab, you will have to restart the game to change the difficulty after completing a game. this will be fixed ASAP.
